Class EntryMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.EntryMgr

  • public class EntryMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all entries via EntryList.txt
    Author:
    JP

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntryMgr()
      Default Constructor Initializes current_id based on latest transaction id in EntryList.txt

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addBackEntry(int id, int transactionType, double amount, java.util.Date date, java.lang.String category1, java.lang.String category2, java.lang.String description)
      Adds back an entry with a previous id into EntryList.txt For undoing a delete operation

      Edits a given entry in EntryList.txt given an updated entry

      Gets the latest id used for a transaction.

      Searches EntryList.txt for and entry with the following id and returns an Entry object
      org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset getTransactionByTime()
      Returns a time series collection for rendering of XY chart Not used currently
      java.util.LinkedList<Entry> getTransactionList()
      Reads the entries from EntryList.txt Returns a sorted linked list of all entries from earliest to latest
      boolean renameCat(int type, java.lang.String oldName, java.lang.String newName)
      Renames all entries having the old category name with the new category name
